alert.note: Alert for Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:26AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wood County through 615 AM CDT... At 526 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Hatfield to 7 miles southeast of Millston to near Tomah. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Babcock around 555 AM CDT. Pittsville around 600 AM CDT. Wisconsin Rapids and Lake Wazeecha around 615 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Sandhill Wildlife Area, Nekoosa, Biron, Walker, Veedum, Scranton, Dexterville, Rudolph, Cranmoor and Port Edwards. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
